摸不著.definition: can't touch; can't reach; (fig.) unable to get a grasp of

摸不著邊.definition: can't make head or tail of

摸不著頭腦.definition: to be unable to make any sense of the matter; to be at a loss

摸吧.definition: touch bar (hostess bar that allows physical contact)

摸底.definition: to have a clear view (of a situation); to fish for information; fact-finding

摸得著.definition: to be able to touch; tangible

摸清.definition: to suss out; to figure out; to ascertain

摸爬滾打.definition: to go through challenging experiences; to become seasoned (in one's profession etc)

摸牌.definition: to draw a tile (at mahjong); to play mahjong

摸石頭過河.definition: lit. crossing the river by feeling for stones; improvise by trial-and-error; move cautiously

摸索.definition: to feel about; to grope about; to fumble; to do things slowly

摸著石頭過河.pinyin: mo1 zhe5 shi2 tou5 guo4 he2
摸著石頭過河.definition: to wade across the river, feeling for footholds as one goes (idiom); to advance cautiously, step by step; to feel one's way forward

摸象.definition: to touch an elephant (of proverbial blind people)

摸魚.definition: to catch fish; (fig.) to loaf on the job; to be slack; to take it easy

摸黑.definition: to grope about in the dark
